content: I just finished recording myself reading Bill Watteson’s commencement speech to the 1990 graduating class of Kenyan College for my kids. I just did it in Voice Memos on my computer. I then put it into a collection of stuff for my kids. There are quotes, advice, links to things, lists and other stuff that I’m collecting for my kids as a reflection of me and my values. More parents should do this kind of thing.
